context_bundle.content:
Platform team establishment guide.

Mission: Enable product teams to deliver faster through self-service infrastructure.

Core Offerings:
- CI/CD pipelines as code
- Infrastructure templates
- Observability stack
- Security scanning

Team Structure:
- Platform engineers (4-6)
- Developer advocates (1-2)
- Product manager (1)

Success Metrics:
- Time to first deploy (new team)
- Deployment frequency
- Lead time for changes
- Developer satisfaction (NPS)
